price: (Fir’awnis) humna waraanaa isaa waliin (dhugaa irraa) gara galee, “(Muusaan) falfalaadha; yookiin maraataadha” jedhe.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
